title: SERENGETI NATIONAL PARK
description: Price per person for 3 days & 2 nights on (Full Board) Serengeti National Park is a Tanzanian national park in the Serengeti ecosystem in the Mara and Simiyu regions. It is famous for its annual migration of over 1.5 million white-bearded wildebeest and 250,000 zebra and for its numerous Nile crocodile and honey badger.

title: SELOUS GAME RESERVE
description: Selous Game Reserve is a protected area in southern Tanzania. It covers a total area of 50,000 km² and has additional buffer zones. It was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1982 due to its wildlife diversity and undisturbed nature.

title: NUNGWI BEACH
description: Nungwi, Kiwengwa and Matemwe . Northeast-nothern end Coast Zanzibar white sand beach-luxury hotels. Kite surfing, Snorkeling, Scuba diving and Game fishing.

title: PAJE BEACH
description: Paje, Bwejuu, Jambiani and Kizimkazi . East-southeast coast Zanzibar white sand beach-luxury hotels. Kite surfing, Snorkeling Scuba diving, Game fishing and Dolphin watching.

title: MNEMBA ISLAND_ZANZIBAR
description: Mnemba Atoll is one of the best diving and snokeling spots on Zanzibar, the water around the island are awash with colourful marine life.

title: NGORONGORO CRATER
description: Ngorongoro Conservation Area is one of the most important prehistoric sites in the world. The Fossils discovered there are said to be the earliest known evidence of the human species.The region has welcomed numerous famous people including Prince William, Bill Clinton and the Queen of Denmark.The Ngorongoro Crater is also referred to as ‘the Garden of Eden’ due to its dazzling beauty and being a paradise for animals.

title: FUMBA BEACH
description: Fumba Beach is a part of Zanzibar, it is located in the southwest of the island the end of the Fumba Peninsula.

title: MOUNTAIN KILIMANJARO
description: Mount Kilimanjaro with its three volcanic cones, "Kibo", "Mawenzi", and "Shira", is a dormant volcano in Tanzania. It is the highest mountain in Africa, with its summit about 4,900 meters from its base, and 5,895 meters above sea level.

title: TUMBATU ISLAND_ZANZIBAR
description: Tumbatu Island is the third-largest island making up Zanzibar, island is located off the north-west coast of Zanzibar's main island, Unguja. Snorkeling and Fishing.

title: PEMBA ISLAND
description: Pemba is an island forming part of the Zanzibar archipelago, lying within the swahili coast in the indian ocean. Diving, Snorkeling Beach and Hotels.

title: BARAZA RESORT & SPA
description: Price is per person per night on All-Inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner & Beverages Included) Transfer airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Baraza Resort and Spa . Named among CNN’s Best Hotels in Africa, and located in northeast Zanzibar, on Bwejuu beach, Baraza Resort and Spa is a first class owner run beach resort. OVERVIEW Set in a garden of sand, lawns, succulents and palms, and traversed by white cobbled paths, Baraza Resort and Spa is unashamedly large, taking both its size and its Arabesque architectural flourishes – domes, arches, mosaics, secret courtyards, huge doorways – from the types of things visitors to the courts of the Sultans of Zanzibar might once have expected to see. Opulent, calm and looked after by the most welcoming of hosts (there are many, each as fine as the last), Baraza is a stone and timber build consisting of a main hotel and 30 sleeping rooms. The main hotel includes multiple bars and restaurants, the Frangipani Spa, a couple of lounges, the Kids Club, a library, gym, business centre, shop, dive school and reception. Characterised by (tiny) tiled flooring, fountains, hanging brass lamps, benches set in alcoves, Zanzibari chests, highly decorated chairs and by great cooling throughways, the main hotel is both relaxing and vast. FOOD AND SERVICE The food is exceptional. Advertising its cuisine as Indian, Arabic, Swahili and Persian (Zanzibari), the kitchen at Baraza Resort and Spa specialises in spice and fish, but is equally adept at preparing pastas, meat dishes and the like. Breakfast and dinner (on selected nights) is served on the Livingston Terrace. Lunch – buffet, snacks and easy cook – can be found at the Ocean Lounge Bar and Restaurant, whilst dinner is best at the Sultan’s Dining Room. Drinking – wine, beer, spirits – can be had at all three, and delicious cocktails are available at the Dhahabu Bar and Lounge. ACCOMMODATION The rooms or villas are divided into 5 classes: one bedroom Villa (7), Ocean Front one bedroom Villa (7), two bedroom Sultan View (5), two bedroom Garden View (10) and the Presidential Ocean Villa (ocean front). The one bedroom villas are a treat. White, flat roofed and approached by means of a stone path, each possesses a massive (Baraza has the effect of exhausting synonyms for large) four poster bed, a seating area, an en suite bathroom and private veranda. The colouring is off white, beige, the woods both dark and light, and well-chosen plants, pots and artefacts add texture to a space otherwise sparse. The bathroom – standalone bath, toilet, shower, twin sink – is a joy. The two bedroom villas are similar, only bigger, while the Presidential suite is all about size and extra service, with separate accommodation provided for guests’ entourages. The complimentary Wi-Fi is outstanding.

title: THE RESIDENCE ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person per night with 2 meals (breakfast & dinner included) in room rate. (HB) Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. The Residence Zanzibar lays within a lush, forested 32-hectare estate where five-star luxuries sit harmoniously alongside nature’s untouched beauty. Feel your spirits soar amid extensive tropical gardens that meet with powder-soft white sand lapped by the crystal clear waters of the Indian Ocean. Inspired by the island’s eclectic cultures, our luxury Zanzibar resort blends modern comforts with Swahili, Omani, British and Indian influences. Indulge in the privacy of the spacious villas, attended on if you wish by your own butler. Enjoy carefree days relaxing by your private pool, on the beach, or exploring the gardens on foot or by bicycle. Savour a taste of the Spice Island’s unique blend of cultures and cuisines, and the pleasure of sensational spa treatments. ACCOMMODATION The resort’s 66 luxuriously appointed villas fuse contemporary style with the elegance of the island’s African, Omani and European heritage. Set within 32 hectares of tropical gardens, the villas offer the perfect combination of spaciousness and privacy. Relaxing comes easy on the lounge deck outside, furnished with wicker chairs and daybeds, overlooking a 1.2-metre-deep private swimming pool and soothing garden, beach or ocean views. If you feel like exploring the beautiful gardens and local surroundings, stroll at your leisure or hop on the bicycles that are provided with each of our Zanzibar luxury villas. DINING Fragrance and flavour combine to create an exciting gastronomic journey at our two restaurants or in the intimacy of your villa. The Dining Room offers international dishes peppered with a hint of Zanzibar “spice”, while Indian, Arabic and Mediterranean influences are at play in The Pavilion Restaurant in an atmospheric dining experience that extends beyond the plate. SPA & WELLNESS Pampering pleasures abound in The Spa, the hotel's star attraction featuring six spacious treatment pavilions, a relaxation area with a whirlpool, sauna and steam room, nestled amongst two hectares of tropical gardens. Woven seamlessly into the natural landscape, this sanctuary of well-being leads you blissfully along the path to rejuvenating mind, body and soul. EVENTS & MEETINGS Immersed in the tranquility and beauty of nature, The Residence Zanzibar provides the most astounding backdrop for life’s most memorable and important occasions, whether the exchange of wedding vows or a glittering VIP event. The resort also provides an ideal venue for meetings and executive retreats, offering elegant, well-equipped spaces for discussions, seminars and conferences, elevated to the next level by the professional expertise of our events team, and exceptional catering options crafted by our talented chefs.

title: MELIA ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person a night on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Meliá Zanzibar is a luxury beach all inclusive resort situated on the north-east coast of the exotic island of Zanzibar, in Tanzania, also known as the “Spice Island”. Meliá Zanzibar is built on a 40 acre estate with a beautiful beach of pearlescent white sand lapped by warm ocean waters, 300 meters long, situated at the very end of the property to procure the perfect combination with nature. The resort is ringed by a natural coral reef, making bathing a relaxing and safe experience. The hotel is around 45 minutes from the international airport of Zanzibar, and the capital city Stone Town, a Unesco World Heritage site. Accommodation The Meliá Zanzibar offers a vast selection of different accommodation types, so no matter what your preference, we have the perfect room for you. Ranging from private villas complete with their own beautiful gardens and breathtaking infinity pools, to romantic pavilions overlooking the Indian Ocean. All rooms and suites are decorated in contemporary style and have been designed to maintain complete privacy. Equipped with large, comfortable bathrooms, outdoor rainforest showers with sky views.

title: PARK HYATT ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person a night includes Breakfast. Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Park Hyatt Zanzibar. Sitting majestically on the beachfront in the heart of Stone Town, a designated UNESCO heritage site, Park Hyatt Zanzibar is the quintessential destination from which to experience the idyllic East African island of Zanzibar and embrace the rich culture, heritage, and historical significance of the hotel’s location. The hotel provides the ultimate haven amongst Stone Town’s labyrinth of winding alleys, bustling markets, mosques, and famed Zanzibari doors, featuring magnificent ornate wooden carvings. ACCOMMODATION Park Hyatt Zanzibar features 67 luxuriously appointed guestrooms, including 11 suites, that seamlessly blend understated elegance, contemporary style, modern technology, and timeless regional accents.

title: HOTEL RIU PALACE ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person 3 nights All inclusive ( Breakfast,Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) included. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. The Hotel Riu Palace Zanzibar is located on Nungwi Beach, a beautiful white-sand beach with crystalline waters that will make you feel like you're truly in paradise. This adults only hotel in Zanzibar, Tanzania, offers you all-inclusive holidays with the exclusive services of RIU Hotels & Resorts. The rooms at this hotel in Zanzibar are notable for their design and spaciousness. In all of them, you will find air conditioning, satellite TV, minibar and a balcony or terrace, along with many other amenities. Plus, the hotel has villas with private pools for those who want a stay in total luxury. At the Hotel Riu Palace Zanzibar you can enjoy a refreshing dip in one of its three pools, relax under the sun in a lounge chair, or go to the beach and enjoy the private area for hotel guests. When it comes to gastronomy, you have the main restaurant for enjoying buffet breakfasts with show-cooking stations, and two theme restaurants that serve exquisite dishes.

title: ZANZIBAR WHITE SAND LUXURY VILLAS & SPA
description: Price is per person per 2 nights with 2 meals included in room rate. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Zanzibar White Sand Luxury Villas & Spa . is a luxury boutique hotel located on the pristine sands of Paje beach, on the East coast of Zanzibar. Our spacious luxury villas (from 500 m2), with their pool and recreational area offer the utmost privacy in a natural setting, while the amenities deliver the highest standard of service: spa treatments and facilities, two restaurants a rooftop champagne bar, a beach bar and a lounge, as well as a high-end kitesurfing and watersport center. The large resort (4 hectares) hosts only 11 luxury villas and 3 cinnamon rooms to ensure the maximum space for each of our Guest in an undisturbed harmony of senses. An experience at Zanzibar White Sand Luxury Villas & Spa is as much about enjoying a cocktail on the rooftop Champagne bar as it is about kitesurfing in the sunset or indulging in a massage at the spa after a day of sunbathing. Whether you are looking for a romantic getaway, family holidays or treating your loved ones to a luxury experience – it is our mission to ensure unforgettable holidays and utmost comfort in a stunning setting.

title: TUI BLUE BAHARI ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person per night on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) included in room rate Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Tui Blue Bahari Zanzibar . Set along a sandy beach on the Indian Ocean, this chic resort is 7 km from Kiwengwa Caves. Refined rooms and suites with 4-poster beds offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, plus safes, and tea and coffee making facilities. Some have whirlpool tubs and/or sitting areas. Villas add terraces with private plunge pools. Breakfast and dinner are included. Other amenities consist of 10 restaurants, a pool bar and a shisha lounge, plus 2 outdoor pools, a tennis court and play areas. A tranquil spa offers a plunge pool, a hammam and a gym, plus a salon. ACCOMMODATION All rooms are beautifully spacious and overlook the Indian Ocean or tropical gardens. They are created within two floored bungalows, with architecture that blends Zanzibar’s Moorish history with African style thatched roofs. Choose from deluxe rooms, Junior Suites and the most exclusive, our Beach Front villas with private pools.

title: XANADU VILLAS & RETREAT
description: Price is per person per 2 nights with a ll meals and selected beverages included in room rate. (All inclusive). Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Xanadu Villas & Retreat is an experience, a lifestyle, an awakening of what life can be, what it should be. It exceeds tranquility, luxury and expectation. Seven uncompromising villas surrounding a pool area so magical it excites images of African and Arabian folklore and a private beach with the warm Indian Ocean a few short steps from each villa. Unmatched in Zanzibar, Xanadu Villas & Retreat was conceived and crafted by her owners Eileen and Marcus out of a desire to breathe. ACCOMMODATION The presidential Mbingu Villa is beach front and features two bedrooms with ocean view balconies, private bathrooms and sitting areas, a majestic lounge and two private plunge pools of which one is on the roof top. Our cozy one bedroom Umande Villa is beach front, has sitting areas inside and outside, a private bathroom and a private plunge pool. Next to Umande villa is our one bedroom Alfajiri Villa which is in fact our honeymoon suite. The Villa is beach front, features one bedroom, a spacious lounge, a private plunge pool and a romantic balcony with ocean view.

title: ZURI ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person per night with (2 meals) included. Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request Zuri Zanzibar offers a completely unique experience in Zanzibar for anyone that wants to try something off the beaten African tracks; a place that allows guests a feeling of peace and tranquility. ACCOMMODATION All of Zuri’s 56 bungalows, suites and villas are fitted-out with a mix of stylish contemporary furniture and local artisanal features and artwork, ensuring a wonderful tropical experience of indoor and outdoor living, with rooms flowing seamlessly out to generous terraces surrounded by lush tropical gardens. All inclusive and full board supplements are available upon request, in addition to standard half board rates.

title: KIDEPO VALLEY NATIONAL PARK
description: Kidepo Valley National Park is highly regarded as the true African wilderness. With incredible wildlife, scenery, and culture Kidepo offers a very unique off-the-beaten-track safari experience. Its location in the northeastern part of Uganda along the border with Both Kenya and South Sudan is the major reason why it has stayed fairly unnoticed and truly untouched by the world. The National park is transected by two seasonal rivers; river Kidepo and river Narus. In the wet seasons, these two rivers are like any other river (with flowing water and all that) but they amaze during the dry season. In the dry season, the river beds become dry and one can walk along the river bed. In case of very heavy rains, the rivers can also experience flash floods that will last only a few hours for the water to flow over into South Sudan. With more than 77 mammals and close to 500 bird species, Kidepo's most popular attraction is the wildlife and game viewing safaris. With animals such as Lions, Elephants, Giraffes, Zebras, Spotted hyena and leopard, Kidepo's variety in wild animals makes for perfect wilderness adventure.

title: NGAMBA ISLAND CHIMPANZEE SANCTUARY
description: Price per  person on (Full Board) Ngamba Island Chimpanzee Sanctuary. Surrounded by the peaceful waters of Lake Victoria, Ngamba Island Chimpanzee Sanctuary is home to 49 orphaned chimpanzees rescued from across East Africa.

title: MURCHISON FALLS NATIONAL PARK
description: Murchison Falls National Park is one of the best game parks to visit while in Uganda. The park is located in the Murchison Conservation Area where we also find the Bugungu and Karuma wildlife reserves. The park is endowed with several attractions including over 76 mammal species with four members of the big five, the lion, the leopards, the elephants, and the Buffaloes. Other species include bushbucks, Uganda kob, waterbucks and warthogs, giraffes, Jackson’s hartebeest, hyenas etc. Along the shores of the nile and within the waters you will see lots of hippos and crocodiles among other resident creatures. There also several primates in the Murchison falls national park including babaoons and several monkey species.

title: QUEEN ELIZABETH NATIONAL PARK
description: Queen Elizabeth National park is undoubtedly Uganda’s most famous national park and traveler’s destination. The presence of varied bionetwork to mention the beautiful lakes, extensive savanna,the natural forests and fertile swamps hence making it the best place the big games,  ten primate species  of course including chimps , 600 bird species. Situated close to mountain Rwenzori, the park’s sites include several beautiful crates lakes that winding through the rolling hills, the panoramic display of the Kazinga channel with an awesome view of the hippos, buffaloes, elephants and several bird species lined up at the shores. With a continuation towards ishasha sector plains, another surprise of tree climbing lions resting on trees waiting to pounce on the Uganda Kobs and other preys will blow one a way.

title: GROUND SHUTTLES (ALL TYPES)
description: All pickups, Are done on the spot to take you to every corner in Zanzibar island by buses, VIP saloon Vehicles and more others tour trucks on the ground. All shuttles are subjected to strong quality customer services. We provide for both individual and group any time and any where all with the help of our professional and ethical drivers to transport our clients to their destinations in both  Tanzania and  Zinzibar during the safaris and to hotels and from airports with an excellent performance records,  Travelling with Comfort is our goal. We care about your experience every where you go.

title: ZAWADI HOTEL ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person per night All inclusive (Breakfast,Lunch, Beverages & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Zawadi hotel sits atop a cliff, with a spectacular view of the Indian Ocean, framed by swaying coconut palms and bougainvillea. It is a private, intimate getaway beach retreat with only twelve spacious villas. Designed in an elegant laid back beach style, Zawadi is a relaxed luxury at its best, lying on one of the most coveted locations on the island of Zanzibar with breathtaking unrivalled views of the Indian Ocean stretching as far as the eye can see. At the center of the property the cliff recedes, creating a beautiful cove of pristine white sandy beach. Guests can enjoy swimming in the warm waters of the Indian Ocean throughout the day regardless of tides and can go snorkeling straight from the beach.

title: BREEZE BEACH CLUB & SPA ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person a night includes (2 meals) Transfer, Airport pick ups & drop offs available upon request Breezes Beach Club & Spa is an ideal choice for those in search of a romantic getaway. Famous for its attention to detail, intimate and private dining, its beautiful Zanzibari decor with stunning carving, glistening brass and rich fabrics creates an elegant and unique atmosphere. Breezes features the award winning Frangipani Spa. Breezes lies along a pristine and untouched beach on the South East coast of Zanzibar island, which is the most quiet and untouched part of the Island chosen by the reputable Conde Nast Traveler magazine as one of the top 30 Island beaches in the world. For centuries the island of Zanzibar has evoked a mystical and magical dream.

title: THE PALMS ZANZIBAR
description: Price per person per night on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch,Beverages & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. The Palms Zanzibar welcomes you to Zanzibar’s most exclusive, private resort with just seven villas in a personalized and intimate setting the perfect, romantic getaway. The Palms is a sanctuary for those in search of tranquilit a place to stimulate the senses and experience the very best of the Island of Zanzibar. The magical Island where the fusion of Arab, African and European cultures has created a pace of life, a style of cuisine and a colorful tapestry of architecture, heritage, myth and magic that is found nowhere else in the world.

title: SEA CLIFF RESORT & SPA
description: Price is per person a night on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. The makuti roofs and glowing Arabic towers of the luxurious Sea Cliff Resort and Spa, on a cliff overlooking the Indian Ocean, forms an exotic backdrop for travellers looking forward to escaping to the tropical beauty of East Africa. Nestling on the Northern-West coast of Zanzibar, just twenty-five minutes from the historical magic of Stone Town, visitors to the Sea Cliff are known to start relaxing as soon as they land in this lap of luxury. The natural colour scheme of cream and gold is complimented by antique furniture that reflects the ancient history of the island. Sea Cliff Resort and Spa offers tranquillity, peace and beauty, with accommodation lush tropical scented gardens, sparkling infinity pools, a variety of cuisine and attentive and helpful staff. The lounges, restaurant, bars and recreation area offers panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. Think breakfast overlooking the ocean, dinner under the stars and sundowners on the jetty or on your own private balcony.

title: TULIA ZANZIBAR UNIQUE BEACH RESORT
description: Price is per person per night Breakfast included Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request Tulia Zanzibar Unique Beach Resort is located on the East coast of Zanzibar Island at the famous Pongwe beach, 39 km from Zanzibar City, Tanzania. This independent resort was opened in 2015 and sets the standard for luxury on Zanzibar Island. All 16 villas are designed to reflect the spirit of Zanzibar.

title: ESSQUE ZALU ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person 1 nights includes (2 meals) Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Essque Zalu Zanzibar bucks the trend of competing resorts who aim to blend in with their local environment. Instead, big and bold form a consistent theme, from the highest makuti thatched roof on the island, to the two roomy restaurants, three well stocked bars, and sprawling lagoon-style pool.

title: KARAFUU BEACH RESORT & SPA
description: Price is per 2 people a night and includes Breakfast. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Karafuu Beach Resort & Spa Set on a secluded stretch of powder-white sand and a gorgeous tropical garden on the island’s east coast, just 50 minutes drive from the airport, Karafuu is the only hotel where you can enjoy a comfortable swim in the ocean at low tide. A 200 meters path in front of the hotel leads you from the beach to a giant natural swimming pool. Whether relaxing on a sunbed, taking a dip in the crystal clear Indian Ocean waters or enjoying a moonlit stroll through endless palm groves, Karafuu Beach Resort and Spa redefines luxury. An authentic reality, unique and precious. The enchanting location lends itself to frame the charm of the respect of traditions, flanked by sincere smiles of ebony and pearl. The essence of pure pleasure is the simplicity carefully carved in details. The bloom of a sensation from a far away past which unites us, because all of us come from here. Africa is the mother, Karafuu is the magical place where we can find her and walk with her, hand in hand, towards the thousand shades of turquoise that draw the horizon, with hesitant senses and bare feet on the soft, candid carpet of coral sand.This is love.

title: SERENGETI NATIONAL PARK
description: Serengeti National Park is a Tanzanian national park in the Serengeti ecosystem in the Mara and Simiyu regions. It is famous for its annual migration of over 1.5 million white-bearded wildebeest and 250,000 zebra and for its numerous Nile crocodile and honey badger. The Maasai people had been grazing their livestock in the open plains of eastern Mara Region which they named "endless plains," for around 200 years when the first European explorer, Austrian Oscar Baumann , visited the area in 1892. The name "Serengeti" is an approximation of the word used by the Maasai to describe the area, siringet , which means "the place where the land runs on forever. The first American to enter the Serengeti, Stewart Edward White , recorded his explorations in the northern Serengeti in 1913. He returned to the Serengeti in the 1920s and camped in the area around Seronera for three months. During this time, he and his companions shot 50 lions. Because the hunting of lions made them scarce, the British colonial administration made a partial game reserve of 800 acres (3.2 km2) in the area in 1921 and a full one in 1929. These actions were the basis for Serengeti National Park, which was established in 1951. The Serengeti gained more fame after the initial work of Bernhard Grzimek and his son Michael in the 1950s. Together, they produced the book and film s erengeti shall not die widely recognized as one of the most important early pieces of nature conservation documentary.

title: ZANZIBAR PRISON ISLAND
description: Prison island is half day private guided tour with snorkeling at (Changuu Island). visiting giant tortoises and discover the ancient history.

title: ZANZIBAR JOZANI FOREST
description: Jozani forest is famous for rare red Columbus monkeys and even harder to spot Zanzibar Sykes’ monkey, a very rare monkey species unique to Zanzibar. Along with Red Columbus Monkeys you can expect to see Bush baby.

title: MASAI MARA NATIONAL PARK
description: Maasai Mara National Reserve is an area of preserved savannah wilderness in southwestern Kenya, along the Tanzanian border. Its animals include lions, cheetahs, elephants, zebras and hippos. Wildebeest traverse its plains during their annual migration. The landscape has grassy plains and rolling hills, and is crossed by the Mara and Talek rivers. Maasai Mara, also known as Masai Mara, and locally simply as The Mara, is a large game reserve in Narok County, Kenya, contiguous with the Serengeti national park in Tanzania. It is named in honor of the Masai people (the ancestral inhabitants of the area) and their description of the area when looked at from afar: "Mara" means "spotted" in the local Maasai language of Maa, due to the many trees which dot the landscape. It is world-renowned for its exceptional populations of lions, leopards, cheetahs and elephants, and the annual migration of wildebeest, zebra, Thomson`s gazelle and other antelope, to and from the Serengeti every year known as the great migration.

title: NGORONGORO CONSERVATION AREA
description: Ngorongoro Conservation Area is one of the most important prehistoric sites in the world. The Fossils discovered there are said to be the earliest known evidence of the human species.The region has welcomed numerous famous people including Prince William, Bill Clinton and the Queen of Denmark.The Ngorongoro Crater is also referred to as ‘the Garden of Eden’ due to its dazzling beauty and being a paradise for animals. The name of the crater has an onomatopoeic origin; it was named by the Maasai pastoralists after the sound produced by the cowbell ( ngoro ngoro ). Based on fossil evidence found at the Olduvai, various hominid species have occupied the area for 3 million years. Hunter-gatherers were replaced by pastoralists a few thousand years ago. The Mbulu came to the area about 2,000 years ago and were joined by the Datooga around the year 1700. Both groups were driven from the area by the Maasai in the 1800s. No Europeans are known to have set foot in the Ngorongoro Crater until 1892, when it was visited by Oscar Baumann. Two German brothers (Adolph and Friedrich Siedentopf) farmed in the crater until the outbreak of World war l, after leasing the land from the administration of German East Africa. The brothers regularly organized shooting parties to entertain their German friends. They also attempted to drive the wildebeest herds out of the crater.

title: NGAMBA ISLAND CHIMPANZEE SANCTUARY
description: Ngamba Island Chimpanzee Sanctuary. Surrounded by the peaceful waters of Lake Victoria, Ngamba Island Chimpanzee Sanctuary is home to 49 orphaned chimpanzees rescued from across East Africa. Ngamba Island is 100 acres (40 ha) of rainforest situated on lake victoria, approximately 27 kilometres (17 mi), by boat south-east of the city of Entebbe, near the Equator in Lake Victoria, Uganda. The island supports a rich diversity of natural wildlife and provides a variety of natural foods for the chimpanzees. It is set up as an eco-friendly project with compost toilets, rainwater collection, proper waste management practices and solar energy for electricity and hot water.

title: MURCHISON FALLS NATIONAL PARK _ Uganda
description: Murchison Falls National Park is one of the best game parks to visit while in Uganda. The park is located in the Murchison Conservation Area where we also find the Bugungu and Karuma wildlife reserves. The park is endowed with several attractions including over 76 mammal species with four members of the big five, the lion, the leopards, the elephants, and the Buffaloes. Other species include bushbucks, Uganda kob, waterbucks and warthogs, giraffes, Jackson’s hartebeest, hyenas etc. Along the shores of the nile and within the waters you will see lots of hippos and crocodiles among other resident creatures. There also several primates in the Murchison falls national park including babaoons and several monkey species. Murchison Falls, also known as Kabalega Falls, is a waterfall between lake victoria and lake albert on the victoria nile in Uganda. At the top of Murchison Falls, the Nile forces its way through a gap in the rocks, only 7 m (23 ft) wide, and tumbles 43 m (141 ft), before flowing westward into Lake Albert. The outlet of lake victoria sends around 300 cubic meters per second (11,000 ft³/s) of water over the falls, squeezed into a gorge less than 10 m (33 ft) wide.

title: BWINDI IMPENETREABLE NATIONAL PARK
description: The Bwindi Impenetrable Forest is a large primeval forest located in south-western Uganda in the Kanungu District. The forest is on the edge of the Albertine Rift, the western branch of the East African Rift, at elevations ranging from 1,160 to 2,607 metres.

title: MOUNTAIN KILIMANJARO
description: Mount Kilimanjaro with its three volcanic cones, "Kibo", "Mawenzi", and "Shira", is a dormant volcano in Tanzania. It is the highest mountain in Africa, with its summit about 4,900 meters from its base, and 5,895 meters above sea level. Kilimanjaro is also the fourth most topograhically prominent peak on Earth. The first people known to have reached the summit of the mountain were Hans Meyer and Ludwig Purtscheller in 1889. The mountain is part of Kilimanjaro National Park and is a major climbing destination. Because of its shrinking glaciers and disappearing ice fields, the mountain has been the subject of many scientific studies.

title: RWENZORI MOUNTAINS
description: The Rwenzori Mountains , previously called the Ruwenzori Range, is a mountain range of eastern equatorial Africa, located on the border between Uganda and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. These mountains support glaciers and are one source of the Nile river. The Rwenzori Mountains reach heights up to 5,109 metres The Rwenzori Mountains are known for their vegetation, ranging from tropical rainforest through alpine meadows to snow. The range supports its own species and varieties of gaint groudsel and gaint lobelia and even has a 6 metres (20 ft) tall heather covered in moss that lives on one of its peaks. Most of the range is now a World Heritage Site and is covered jointly by the Rwenzori Mountains National Park in south-western Uganda and the Virunga National Park in the eastern DRC. There is no water shortage in the Rwenzori; yet, several members of the afro-alpine family resemble species that normally thrive in desert climates. The reason lies in their similar water economy. Water is not always readily available to the afroapine plants when they need it. In addition, nightly frosts affect the sap transport in the plants and the intake of water by its roots. As the day begins, the air temperature and radiation level rise rapidly, putting strenuous demands on the exposed parts of the plants as they try to meet the transpiration demands of the leaves and maintain a proper water balance. To counter the effects of freezing, the afro-alpine plants have developed the insulation systems that give them such a striking appearance. These adaptations become more prominent as the altitude increases.

title: MIKUMI NATIONAL PARK
description: Mikumi national park is Tanzania’s fourth-biggest national park. It’s additionally the most open from Dar es Salaam. With confirmed wildlife sightings, it makes a perfect safari goal for those who are busy and have less time to travel, two days or more can get you an opportunity to explore the splendor of mikumi national park..Since  the formation of a highway connecting mikumi national park  to  Dar es Salaam tanzanias busiests and largest city , Mikumi National Park has been slated to  to be a major a hotspot for the travel industry in Tanzania. Situated between the Uluguru Mountains and the Lumango go, Mikumi is the fourth biggest national park in Tanzania and just a couple of hours drive from Tanzania’s biggest city. The park center has a wide assortment of natural life that can be simple spotted and furthermore very much suitable to viewing in a game drive. Its vicinity to Dar es Salaam and the measure of wildlife that live inside its fringes makes Mikumi National Park a well-known choice  for those travelers who don’t have much time but also want to enjoy  a wildlife safari to mikumi national park.

title: SELOUS GAME RESERVE
description: Selous Game Reserve is a protected area in southern Tanzania. It covers a total area of 50,000 km2 (19,000 sq mi) and has additional buffer zones. It was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1982 due to its wildlife diversity and undisturbed nature. Some of the typical wildlife of the miombo inhabits the reserve, such as African bush elephat, black rhino, hippopotamus, lion, East Africa wild dog, Cape buffaloes, Masai giraffe, Plains zebra, and Nile crocodile. Permanent human habitation is not permitted within the reserve. All human entry and exit is controlled by the Wildlife Division of the Tanzanian Ministry of Natural Resources and Tourism.

title: GOLDEN TULIP ZANZIBAR RESORT
description: Price is per person 1 nights includes Breakfast. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Golden Tulip Zanzibar Resort , we believe business and pleasure can mix! The hotel has a total of 32 elegantly designed rooms accommodating its guests in well decorated spacious rooms and lounges with ocean view and city view. The Dhow Restaurant – serving all types of varieties from different cuisines located on the 5th floor of the building. make your stay fun.

title: AZAO RESORT & SPA
description: Price per person per night breakfast included in room rate. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Azao Resort and Spa has been designed and developed to be a peaceful haven for all explorers of the world. Whether you seek oneness with nature, an active getaway, some family bonding, inner peace or rest and recuperations, you will find your own space in Azao. The resort is nestled along the mangrove laced coral cliffs on the North-Eastern coast of the enchanting spice island of Zanzibar. The character of the resort blends perfectly with the natural settings of the mangrove, coral lagoon and Indian Ocean beyond.

title: BLUE BAY BEACH RESORT & SPA
description: Price is per person 1 night includes ( 2 meals ) Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Bluebay Beach Resort & Spa is situated on the finest white, sandy beach on the east coast of the island of Zanzibar. Set in 30-acres of tropical gardens with over 1,000 palm trees, the resort is one of Zanzibar’s most prestigious properties offering the ultimate in beach comfort: excellent accommodation; fine wining and dining and the famous Oasis Spa. As well as being a magical destination for holidaymakers wishing to soak up the sun and the enchanting culture of Zanzibar, the resort also offers excellent facilities for meetings, conferences and group incentives. Our weddings and events team can also plan your private party, your wedding ceremony and reception and, of course, your honeymoon.

title: NUNGWI BEACH RESORT
description: Price per person for 1 night on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) included in room rate. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request Nungwi Beach Resort by Turaco Zanzibar - Nungwi enjoy views of the Indian Ocean and direct beach access five minutes from the traditional fishing village of Nungwi. Built in the traditional Zanzibar style with Makti palm leaf roofs, this resort features an outdoor freshwater pool, fitness center, water sports, live entertainment, and spa facilities.

title: GOLD ZANZIBAR BEACH HOUSE & SPA
description: Price is per person 2 nights on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) included in room rate. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Gold Zanzibar Beach House and Spa ; offers guests stylish, individually decorated accommodations with a terrace overlooking the Indian Ocean or garden. It features a restaurant, bar and an outdoor pool with tropical garden surroundings. The 2 restaurants at Gold Zanzibar Beach House and Spa; serve an array of international and local à la carte and buffet-style cuisine. The 2 Bars serve a variety of cocktails and beverages throughout the day. Guests can sunbathe poolside or on the sun terrace, surrounded by palm trees and overlooking the beach. Relax with a choice of Spa and massage treatments and for the sports minded guests.

title: MADINAT AL BAHR
description: Price is Per night per person includes (Breakfast & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Madinat Al Bahr a “city on the sea” is a unique and only palatial hotel hugging the azure waters of the Indian Ocean and enhanced by a white sandy beach on the best of the Zanzibar’s coast. Purpose designed and built, the state of the art resort hotel exudes the grandeur of an Ottoman palace combining the rich culture, colours and warmth of an African heritage wrapped in captivating modernity. Lovingly decorated inch by inch regardless of cost to compliment the structure, the resort hotel depicts stunning ambience and surroundings to please any hard to please critic. Embraced by lush landscaped gardens and dancing palms, the resort hotel overlooks some of the finest sand banks and enchanting islands visible over the local fisherman canoes.

title: DIAMOND'S MAPENZI BEACH
description: Diamonds Mapenzi Beach walk down kiwenga beach to experience an evocative atmosphere and unforgettable landscapes, enjoy a relaxing atmosphere and an all inclusive high quality culinary experience. Come and experience the best of Zanzibar and its unforgettable landscapes, enjoy scents and flavors unique in the world that will fascinate you, just like the fantastic sunsets that only this island can offer. The all-inclusive formula allows you to enjoy every moment of your holiday without any thought.

title: MY BLUE HOTEL
description: Price is per person a night (Breakfast & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Myblue Hotel is situated in the splendid scenario of Nungwi, famous for its sunsets and for its sea. The island is developed in longitudinal manner and embraces an elegant and original tone to allow for a relaxing and peaceful vacation. As you get closer and closer to the equipped beach, you are overwhelmingly stunned by the many enchanting different shades of blues of the Indian Ocean and of the splendid white and fine sand, admiring a wonderful bay protected by a frame of rocks. The hotel is overlooking a calm and crystal clear sea that, unlikethe rest of the isalnd, is rarely interested in the phenomenon of the high tides.

title: NEPTUNE PWANI BEACH RESORT & SPA
description: Price is per person a night on All inclusive (Breakfast,beverages & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Neptune Pwani Beach Resort and Spa features 2 fresh water pools and a tropical garden. Earth and Rain Spa features a sauna, steam bath, pool and offers massage and beauty treatments.  The Neptune Pwani resort has 6 restaurants offering local cuisine, seafood and Indian food and Thai cuisine. There are also 3 bars. Meals and entertainment are included. There is a pizzeria and a cafe, along with Thai and Indian restaurants. Additional amenities include poolside and beachfront bars, plus 2 outdoor pools and a breezy spa.

title: ROYAL ZANZIBAR BEACH RESORT
description: Price per person 2 nights on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Royal Zanzibar Beach Resort is one of the most romantic hotels in Zanzibar and the perfect honeymoon getaway. On the edge and the Indian Ocean, Royal Zanzibar Beach Resort welcomes guests to a luxury tropical sanctuary, where greetings of warm smiles and gentle breezes fill each day. Royal Zanzibar Beach Resort offers a paradise setting for a luxurious holiday escape. The hotel's spacious rooms and suites overlook the tropical gardens, swimming pools and Indian Ocean beyond. Relax in the beautiful infinity edge swimming pool and admire the views with a drink from the swim up Upepo pool bar. Alternatively, enjoy a cool drink at the Baraza Beach Bar as the sun sets.

title: SANDIES BAOBAB ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person a night on  All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) included. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off avaialable upon request. Sandies Baobab Zanzibar , is located on the famous white beach of Nungwi, on the northern tip of Zanzibar. The structure takes its name from the majestic, century old Baobabs, found dotted around the Resort compound, making it a unique tropical oasis immersed in nature. The rooms of the Resort are surrounded by tropical gardens and trees. The Resort has direct access to the beach with a restaurant, pool and pool bar, all facing the beach and the turquoise blue waters. An amphitheatre hosts the resorts evening entertainment with shows, local dancers, musicians and acrobats.

title: HOTEL VERDE ZANZIBAR (RESORT & SPA)
description: Price is per person 3 nights includes ( Breakfast & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Hotel Verde Zanzibar - Azam Luxury Resort & Spa as the island’s greenest hotel, it is one of a kind. Set just outside historic Stone Town and it is the ideal location for all travel purposes; family holidays, special events, adventure or business travel. Each room offers luxury accommodation with a private balcony and ocean-facing views of the coast or the mangrove forest. This offbeat island, is ideal for travellers who enjoy going off  the beaten path, who want to mix the island life with an array of activities for holiday goers.

title: Z HOTEL ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person per night Breakfast included. Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. The Z hotel is the original boutique hotel on zanzibar; opening in 2010, it brings casual relaxation blended with contemporary london–inspired design to the beaches of zanzibar providing the 21st century traveller with a fresh and original beach-holiday experience. Set in a tropical garden with steps to white powder of nungwi’s award winning beach and temperate indian ocean, the Z hotel will provide you with everything you need for a unique away-from-it-all holiday but with all the advantages of modern living. A london-inspired design blends philippe starck furniture and lighting with zanzibari features to create a bright, airy atmosphere. the Z was named one of the ‘trendiest hotels in africa’ by tripadvisor and the world travel awards – and the only one in tanzania.

title: ZANZI RESORT
description: Price is per person per 1 nights on 2 meals included. Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request Zanzi Resort sits on the edge of the Indian Ocean, 15 km from the historic Stone Town. Thirteen spacious, artistically designed villas and bungalows offer an intimate environment with patios, some featuring private pools. The resort, spread over six hectares of plush tropical gardens, has an excellent in-house restaurant and treatment area, offering oceanside massages and the Japanese hot-stone treatment, gambanyoku. Local cuisine is prepared for an international palate with fresh seafood, organic vegetables, and spices from our own eco-plantation. Guests can dine in the restaurant, in the privacy of their villa or bungalow, or on the beach.

title: STONE TOWN (CITY TOUR)
description: Stone town is an outstanding private guided walking tour, we can arrange the pickup from your hotel and return.

title: ZANZIBAR SPICE TOUR
description: Spice tour is one of the most interesting and educating tours about Zanzibari spices, flavors and fruits. Spices have played an important role in Zanzibari culture and history.

title: ZANZIBAR_DOLPHIN TOUR
description: Dolphin is a very interesting tour to do as you get the whole chance to get and swim closer with dolphins in their free and wildlife. Dolphins are friendly marine mammals and not harmful to human life.

title: ZANZIBAR_SAFARI BLUE
description: Safari blue excursion operating from Fumba village and exploring the Menai Bay Conservation Area by traditional hand-built wooden dhows. Includes guided snorkelling with quality kit, ngalawa sailing, swimming in a mangrove lagoon, a delicious seafood.

title: ZANZIBAR NAKUPENDA SANDBANK PICNIC
description: This full day excursion includes something for everyone. From relaxing on the white sands of the Pange Sandbank to snorkeling for tropical fish and devouring a BBQ Seafood Buffet - guests are in for a treat!

title: ZANZIBAR MNEMBA ISLAND
description: Snorkeling or diving excursion is a great day out, not to be missed. It includes world class snorkeling and diving at the famous Mnemba Atoll, a marine conservation area, followed by a scrumptious seafood on the idyllic Muyuni beach.

title: ZANZIBAR AQUARIUM
description: The Sea Turtle lagoon is a natural lagoon separated from the Indian Ocean by a few meters of old reef rocks… but the tide within the lagoon is a clear indication that the connection with the Ocean is open.

title: ZAZIBAR SUNSET CRUISE
description: Sunset cruise is perfect to watch the worlds famous sunset of Zanzibar’s West Coast from Stone town where guests can enjoy the best view of the capital from the water. Snacks and drinks are provided on the traditional wooden dhow.

title: ZANZIBAR_HORSE RIDE
description: Horse ride with a qualified teaching and riding instructor. Riders of all levels are welcome to experience the opportunity of spectacular sunset beach rides as well as a beautiful scenic trail around and over the golf course to the beach.

title: ZANZIBAR VILLAGE TOUR
description: Village tour is special requested day tour, we may organise this village tour after listening your expectation, the main reason is we do have three main options Jambian-Paje village, Nungwi village and Kizimkazi village.

title: THE ROCK RESTURANT
description: Enjoy lunch and dinner on a world-famous restaurant, known not only for its extraordinary location, but also its fabulous food inspired by the natural resources, a twist of Zanzibar, and Italian love.

title: ZANZIBAR QUAD
description: Drive your own off-road quad on the island of Zanzibar and discover its rich wild nature and beautiful landscapes. Experience the true Zanzibar and its culture.

title: ZANZIBAR_BUTTERFLY CENTRE
description: Zanzibar butterfly centre is an interactive butterfly exhibit near to Jozani-Chawka Bay National Park on Unguja island, though outside the park boundaries. The exhibit consists of a netted tropical garden with usually hundreds of butterflies.

title: ZANZIBAR WATER SPORT ACTIVITIES
description: If you are looking for fun water sports and enjoy the amazing views of our island then fly with Parasailing, guided Jet Ski Tours, Water skiing, Wakeboarding, Flyfish, Ringos and the ever popular Banana Boat.

title: BEACH DAY TOUR
description: Relax at the White-sand beach at Zanzibar spend an entire day on the beachside and just take in all the serene and peaceful views by the sea! for the honeymoon, business trip, event or any occasion.

title: ZANZIBAR_ DEEP SEA FISHING
description: Zanzibar is known the world over for its prime deep sea fishing locations where big game fish abound. The channel that lies between Zanzibar and Pemba offers many year-round deep sea angling opportunities.

title: TOA HOTEL & SPA ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person per night on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch,Beverages & Dinner) included. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off availabe upon request . Located in Pongwe, a few steps from Pongwe Beach, TOA Hotel & Spa Zanzibar provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. All units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. TOA Hotel & Spa Zanzibar offers certain rooms with sea views, and rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. A buffet, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. TOA Hotel & Spa Zanzibar offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre and terrace. The area is popular for fishing and cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Kiwengwa Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Peace Memorial Museum is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Abeid Amani Karume International Airport, 35 km from TOA Hotel & Spa Zanzibar.

title: EMERALD ZANZIBAR RESORT & SPA
description: Price is per person 1 night All inclusive (Breakfast,Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) Transfer, Airport pickups & drop offs available upon request The Emerald Zanzibar Resort & Spa is a serene escape that effortlessly blends the exotic natural environment with the elegance of contemporary style. Located on the pristine white sands of Matemwe's Muyuni Beach, the curated all-inclusive retreat offers private waterfront access to the destination's flourishing reefs and marine conservation areas. Overlooking the picturesque beauty of Mnemba Island, the expansive property preserves and pays homage to the destination's natural and cultural heritage while pampering guests with the comforts of modern living

title: HOTEL RIU JAMBO
description: Price is per person 3 nights All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner) included. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Hotel Riu Jambo is located on the north coast of Zanzibar by the turquoise waters of Nungwi Beach , one of the most beautiful spots on the island to watch the incredible sunset. In a gorgeous natural setting, this 24-hour all-inclusive hotel in Zanzibar i s the perfect place to escape from the daily grind, relax and disconnect. Built in a traditional architectural style, this beach resort in Zanzibar, Tanzania, offers more than 300 elegant rooms that have been carefully designed to ensure you have a restful stay. What better way to start the day in paradise than with a delicious buffet breakfas t and a refreshing dip in the sea? This beach hotel in Zanzibar is the perfect choice for families and couples alike and offers a variety of activities, nighttime entertainment, live music and shows for all ages. What’s more, there are 4 fabulous outdoor pools , one of which has a swim-up bar exclusively for adults . Our youngest guests can have a great time in the children’s pool or at the RiuLand kid’s club with our entertainment team. Sports lovers are spoilt for choice with a wide choice of options including kayaking and paddle surf. After enjoying your holiday to the max, you can recharge your batteries in the Renova Spa or book any treatments that you fancy The Hotel Riu Jambo offers a wide range of dining options so that you can enjoy the best flavours from around the world, from more traditional cuisine in the Asian restaurant to international restaurants with show-cooking stations and oversea à la carte gourmet restaurants. What’s more, you can visit the hotels various bars, which offer appetisers, snacks and drinks throughout the day so you can enjoy RIU’s excellent 24-hour all-inclusive service .

title: UROA BAY BEACH RESORT
description: Price per person per night Breakfast included Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request Uroa Bay Beach Resort is a four star resort hotel conveniently located South East of Zanzibar Uroa, just 45 minutes from Karume International Airport and just 45 minutes from - the most exciting resort of Zanzibar all year round. The hotel offers 135 rooms to choose from, including Sea Front, Sea view, Garden view Rooms and Family rooms. Indulge your mind and body at the Leisure facilities at the Uroa Bay Beach Resort The facilities includes Spa, Outdoor Swimming Pool and Tennis court. The Rafiki restaurant serving a wide range of international cuisine. You can also enjoy a delightful selection of cookies, fresh pastries, juices and coffee. Our privileged location in Zanzibar combined with the highest levels of hospitality and comfort makes the Uroa Bay Beach Resort your best choice in Zanzibar.

title: REEF & BEACH RESORT-SPA
description: Price is per person 2 nights on All inclusive (Breakfast, Lunch, Beverages & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Reef & Beach Resort & Spa is located between two villages named Jambiani and Makunduchi. Not only has the resort been renovated recently in 2020 but have opened up a brand new section with rooms, restaurant, pool and bar. You will enjoy a spacious holiday beside the Indian Ocean with over 600 meters of seafront, swimming pools, pool bars, a magical Jetty bar and a sun terrace along with comfortable sunbeds and stunning ocean views. We have a Massage and Wellness Centre in company with a Gym. The resort has a buffet and A-La-Carte Restaurant that caters for all. We also offer a 24-hour reception and Guest Relations Office for any queries or to book excursions, taxis and last-minute safari trips.

title: SUNSET KENDWA
description: Price is per person a night on full board (Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request . Sunset Kendwa Hotel .  Living and playing on the beach, a dream come true for all. Perfectly located in the highlight of the islands, Nungwi, Zanzibar. Swaying palms, huge, white powder sand beaches and warm, clear water to swim in all day in the real-life paradise of Zanzibar. Enjoy the unspoiled beauty of the islands, with spectacular views of the Indian Ocean. A range of accommodation options for couples, families and groups of friends, right on the beach or up on the coral cliff, spacious and comfortable. Our on-the-beach restaurant with delicious meals made with the freshest ingredients, with Swahili specialities to western favourites. Our Mnazi Beach Bar and shisha lounge are ideal locations for you to sip a cocktail while gazing out at a spectacular sunset over the Indian Ocean. Chill, hang-out, swing in a hammock in the palm grove, and let the peace set in

title: KENDWA ROCKS HOTEL
description: Price is per person a night on Full-Board includes ( Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner). Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off avaiable upon request. Kendwa Rocks Beach Hotel is Perfectly located in the highlight of the islands, Nungwi, Zanzibar.   Swaying palms, huge, white powder sand beaches and warm, clear water to swim in all day in the real-life paradise of Zanzibar. Enjoy the unspoiled beauty of the islands, with spectacular views of the Indian Ocean. A range of accommodation options for couples, families and groups of friends, right on the beach or up on the coral cliff, spacious and comfortable. Our on-the-beach restaurant with delicious meals made with the freshest ingredients, with Swahili specialities to western favourites. Our Mnazi Beach Bar and shisha lounge are ideal locations for you to sip a cocktail while gazing out at a spectacular sunset over the Indian Ocean. Chill, hang-out, swing in a hammock in the palm grove, and let the peace set in

title: AMAAN BEACH BANGALOWS
description: Price is per person 1 night including breakfast. Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request Amaan Beach Bungalows is Along an Indian Ocean beach, this unfussy hotel is an 11-minute walk from Nungwi Beach, 2 km from the turtles at Mnarani Natural Aquarium and 58 km from the ferry terminal in vibrant Stone Town. Low-key rooms feature wood furnishings, ceiling fans and mosquito nets, as well as balconies or patios with garden views. Upgraded rooms, some with 4-poster beds, add air-conditioning and pool or ocean views; some also have minifridges or flat-screen TVs. Amenities include beach access, and an outdoor pool surrounded by a terrace overlooking the ocean. There's an airy cafe, and an open-air, thatched-roof restaurant. Parking is available

title: SMILE BEACH HOTEL
description: Price is per person a night includes ( 2 meals). Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Smiles Beach Hotel a 8,200 sqm private property is located on the coastal fishing village of Nungwi, Zanzibar’s north western coastline. Both Nungwi and the hotel boast the island’s famous white sand and crystalline water offering the picture postcard setting. Since 2001 our family-run hotel warmly welcomes all to come and enjoy Zanzibar’s finest. With our resort on the beach, all of our 22 rooms face the ocean and in addition our swimming pool which faces out to the sea and stands as an oasis sits beautifully to the side of our tropical gardens. All of our rooms offer either a balcony or patio area allowing you to relax and watch the ocean and admire the simply awe-inspiring sunsets.

title: KIWENGWA BEACH RESORT
description: Price is person a night includes ( Breakfast and Dinner). Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Kiwengwa Beach Resort 5* is situated on the north east coast and is one of the best hotel in Zanzibar, the Spice island.  The hotel has just been completely renovated into the bedrooms and in the public areas. The architect has chosen to combine the typical warm colors of Africa, used for the common areas, to the typical blue sea, used inside the rooms: the end result is a refined style that fully respects the ambient and present to the atmosphere something to special. Kiwengwa Beach Resorts have 120 rooms facing the longest white sand beach on the island. There is 30 suites and 90 standard rooms, all with en-suite bathrooms. There is 1 Honeymoon suite of 56 mq; it is directly on the beach with stunning view, private terrace, large en-suite bathroom, indoor jacuzzi, mini bar, tea & coffee facilities and free wifi. It have the possibility to be connect with a suite of 36 mq, with private entrance to make a Royal Family Suite of 92 mq. There are 17 Luxury bungalows & suites. They are room of 36/46 mq; they have: sea view, outdoor jacuzzi, private terrace, mini bar, tea & coffee facilities and free wifi. There are 12 bungalows, 2 with sea view and 10 with garden view. They are room of 30/36 mq and have outdoor jacuzzi, private terrace, mini bar, tea & coffee facilities, free wifi. There are 90 standard rooms, 30 with sea view and 60 with garden view. They are room of 30/32 mq. All rooms have been up-graded, with new bathrooms, furniture and fittings. About the restaurants Kiwengwa offer a Main Buffet and Grill Restaurant, with water-feature and view of the new swimming-pool and a Beach Restaurant, a la carte, directly on the beach with bar and lounge There is a Lounge bar with view of the beach and serving finger food and imported alcohol, this bar have a large lounge area and a zone with satelite TV. There is also a new extended beach bar, on the beach with music and dancing. Kiwengwa Beach Resort is directly on the beach of Kiwengwa, have a private zone with typical sunbeds and umbrella. For the guests are available the beach towels, for the beach and for the pool area. For who love the wellness and the relax of the mind there is a Spa near the beach with 2 massage room, hammam, hair and nails salon, outdoor relaxing tea and juice lounge. Upper floor Gym with panoramic view. Other facilities: reception area, swimming-pool and pool terrace, shuttle service or private limousine, water sports, beach volley ball, tennis court, mini golf, bike rental, 2 shops, travel agents front desk, beach massage area, beach disco, entertainment, live music and beach wear fashion show

title: GOLDEN PALM BOUTIQUE ZANZIBAR
description: Price is per person 1 night includes Breakfast. Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. Golden Palm Boutique Zanzibar Set along an Indian Ocean beach, this laid-back hotel is 2 km from Abeid Amani Karume International Airport, and 8 km from bars and restaurants in Stone Town. It's 9 km from the Peace Memorial Museum. Warm, relaxed rooms feature TVs, and balconies or terraces, as well as minibars, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some offer ocean views. Upgraded rooms add sitting areas with sofabeds. Amenities include a restaurant, an outdoor pool and a gym. An airport shuttle and parking are available, as are Wi-Fi and breakfast. Free Wi-FiFree/parking/Beach access/PoolTable/Restaurant

title: IMARA BEACH RESORT
description: Price is per 2 people a night and includes Breakfast. Transfer, Airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Imara Beach Resort is conveniently located at kairo kiwengwa in Kiwengwa in 2.3 km from the centre. SPA and Wellness Center offers you a diversity of procedures and services. Guests can use the babysitting services for children and hire a nanny for their kids. A hotel has room service. There are non-smoking rooms provided. The accommodation has free access to the Internet. You can get from/to the airport with great comfort using the shuttle service. You can try snorkeling on the coast. Laundry at the hotel is a guarantee of a comfortable stay for the guests. The hotel offers its own restaurant on-site. Guests can pay for services using these types of payment cards: American Express, Visa, Mastercard, Maestro. Accommodation staff is fluent in Russian, Italian, Arabic and English For tourists, accommodation are offered 2 rooms in the resort. Guests can choose between different types of rooms: quadruple, double. Of the amenities, there are minibar, safety deposit box, telephone, air conditioning, hairdryer, refrigerator, free toiletries. Accommodation has a lot of rooms with sea view, pool view.

title: LE MERSENNE BEACH RESORT
description: Price is per night per person includes ( Breakfast ). Transfer airport pick up & drop off available upon request. Le Mersenne Beach Resort : Situated in Michamvi, a few steps from Michamvi Pingwe Beach, Le Mersenne Zanzibar, Autograph Collection features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel has a garden and a terrace. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving African, American and Indian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Jozani Forest is 23 km from Le Mersenne Zanzibar, Autograph Collection. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.4 for a two-person trip

title: THE NEST BOUTIQUE RESORT
description: Price is per 2 persons per 1 night includes (Breakfast). Transfer, Airport pickup & drop off available upon request. The Nest Boutique Resort Paje is located 0.8 km from Supermarket and offers live performances and a restaurant. The venue is situated 1 km from Paje city, Facing the beachfront, The Nest Boutique Resort offers 5-star accommodation in Paje and features an outdoor swimming pool, garden and terrace.  The Nest is the first 100% Vegetarian restaurant on the beach of Paje. Our team believes in a philosophy of non-violence (Ahimsa). We try to minimize the damage.
